full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** Installation, Inspection, and Repair of Fire Alarm Systems for Various Buildings at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown

**Reference Number:** WS4422836275

**Solicitation Number:** WS4422836275

### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Gagetown, invites contractors to submit proposals for the installation, inspection, and repair of fire alarm systems for various buildings. The contract includes the following services:

* Maintenance and troubleshooting of Notifier panels and devices
* Repairs and replacements of Notifier panels and devices

### Contract Details

* Contract Category: Facilities Maintenance
* Estimated Contract Value: $100,001 to $500,000
* Contract Period: Semi-annual maintenance and inspections
* Contract Start Date: To be determined

### Pre-Qualification Requirements

* Contractors must have experience in fire alarm system installation, inspection, and repair
* Contractors must have a sound understanding of Notifier panels and devices

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity

* New Brunswick

### Contact Information

* Name: Gary Bryant, PWGSC
* Email: [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18724175?extsite=MTg3MjQxNzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Information

* A comprehensive statement of work can be found in the associated documents.
* Bidders must submit proposals electronically through the listed URL.
